column6: DON'T MISS THIS! It's a prelude to the biggest Wolverine arc in years. War is brewing between the ninja assassins of the Hand and the gun-toting gangsters of the Yakuza, and it leads Wolverine to come face to face with Wilson Fisk, the infamous Kingpin of crime. What mysterious former love interests have come along for the ride? And just who is behind this war anyway? Do you like surprises? If so, then don't miss this issue's last page, as it offers up a doozy.
column8: | writer:Jason Aaron | artist:Renato Guedes | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Matthew Wilson
